title: White House in agony as Trump, aides mourn slain activist
shortDescription: Charlie Kirk was more than just another MAGA ally to Donald Trump and his aides. The 31-year-old conservative was close to many in the White House.

title: Polish PM denies Trump suggestion that drone raid was a “mistake”
shortDescription: Donald Tusk, prime minister of Poland, dismissed the U.S. president's suggestion that the incursion by Russian drones could have been a mistake.

title: After Kirk shooting, members of Congress say they don't feel safe
shortDescription: Democrats canceled a town hall in Michigan, and a Republican congresswoman said she'll carry a gun in her home state.

title: Trump plans National Guard deployment to Memphis
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told Fox News' 'Fox and Friends' there are plans to send the National Guard to Memphis.

title: Trump says he'll send National Guard to Memphis
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has announced plans to send the National Guard to Memphis to address crime concerns.

title: Kayleigh McEnany: Revisit her time as Trump's press secretary
shortDescription: Trump's former press secretary Kayleigh McEnany is getting her own show on Fox. Take a look back at her time at the White House.

title: Trump says Russian drone incursion into Poland possibly an error
shortDescription: Amid heightened tensions in Eastern Europe, President Trump downplayed the recent incursion of Russian drones into Polish airspace.

title: Trump says 'radicals on the left are the problem' after Kirk shooting
shortDescription: Trump argued in an interview that the “radicals on the left are the problem” following the assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk.

title: Trump is booed and cheered at Yankees game. Sports events he’s attended
shortDescription: President Trump attended a New York Yankees game on 9/11. He was booed and cheered in the stadium. How tall is Aaron Judge, who towered over Trump?

title: Flying taxis? Trump admin launching pilot program to speed deployment
shortDescription: The FAA said the program will include at least five projects from public-private partnerships with state and local governments and private companies.

title: Trump predicts Mamdani win in NYC mayor's race
shortDescription: The president attributes the 33-year-old democratic socialist's success in the polls to New York City frustrations with "bad candidates" in the race

title: Trump says his patience is 'running out' with Putin over Ukraine war
shortDescription: The president spoke about the status of negotiations in a FOX News interview.

title: Trump urges lawmakers who canceled events to 'go forward'
shortDescription: Politics is a "dangerous business," Trump said in an interview on "Fox and Friends."

title: Charlie Kirk murder suspect in custody, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump revealed a suspect is in custody for the murder of Charlie Kirk during an exclusive "Fox & Friends" appearance.

title: Trump says suspect in Charlie Kirk fatal shooting is in custody
shortDescription: President Trump said a minister close to the suspect in the Charlie Kirk shooting turned him in to law enforcement.
